description: You are in the castle foyer. The room has a large, vaulted ceiling that is open to the sky from some cataclysm that collapsed the roof. You can see up to the the castle's second floor balcony from here. To the North you can see the entrance. A passageway leads to the South.
hidden: Curiously, there is no stone debris on the floor, as one would expect beneath the collapse of a castle's roof
